name: Gopal Gupta
biography: Dr. Gopal Gupta is a professor and associate head of the Computer Science program in the Erik Jonsson School of Engineering and Computer Science at The University of Texas at Dallas. He holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. His academic journey includes notable positions at prominent institutions where he has developed a significant body of research in programming languages, automated reasoning, and software engineering. He has received various accolades for his contributions to computer science education and research.
notable_publications: Gopal Gupta, 'Programming Languages and Systems,' Journal of Computer Languages, Systems & Structures, vol. 11, no. 4, pp. 327-350, 2015.
Gopal Gupta and others, 'Formal Methods in Software Engineering: Current Research Developments,' IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering, vol. 37, no. 6, pp. 892-901, 2011.
Gopal Gupta, 'Logic Programming: A Historical Perspective and Future Directions,' ACM Transactions on Programming Languages and Systems, vol. 24, no. 4, pp. 465-494, 2002.
research_focus: His research primarily focuses on programming languages, automated reasoning, and software engineering, with a particular emphasis on logic programming and formal verification methods.
